entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5 except low minus 9 inland. POP 40%
